int getpath (const char *src, char *dest, int max_chars)
 Get only the path from the string, like if we pass /bin/ls We get /bin/ /param src The source path /param dest The destination string /param max_chars Maximum number of characters /return the number of characters, counting the NULL character on the end.
int getfile (const char *path, char *filename, int max_chars)
 Get only the file from the string, like if we pass /bin/ls We get ls /param path The source path /param filename Where the file will be stored /param max_chars Maximum number of characters /return the number of characters, counting the NULL character on the end.
